items.headline: This hedge fund says the trouble with bubbles is that they’re not predictive
items.summary_en: The November newsletter of one of the more successful hedge funds of recent times makes it clear that while U.S. valuations are indisputably stretched, it’s not at all useful for market timing.

items.headline: Here’s the message to draw from the S&P 500 falling below the 50-day average for the first time in 139 sessions
items.summary_en: As the S&P 500 broke below the 50-day average for the first time in 139 sessions, MarketWatch looked back to find out what happened when the benchmark index broke below that technical level in the past.

items.headline: Once you reach this magic number in emergency savings, ‘you no longer have to give up hope’ financially
items.summary_en: While having $2,000 saved is still well below the amount financial planners recommend for a full emergency fund, surveys show that it is a critical threshold for people’s financial well-being. Here’s why.
